title: George Washington and the General's Dog
description: Children will delight at this little-known-story about our nation's first president, George Washington, that makes for perfect President's Day readers!Boom! Bang! Guns fire! Cannons roar! This Step 3 History Reader is about George Washington fighting in the American Revolution. He sees a dog lost on the battlefield. Whose dog is it? How will it find its master? Early readers will be surprised to find out what happens in this little-known true story about America’s first president.Step 3 Readers feature engaging characters in easy-to-follow plots about popular topics. These books are for children who are ready to read on their own.
author: Frank  Murphy
